title: Apollo to Open Trading on Private Chip Loan for Musk’s xAI
description: Apollo Global Management Inc. is trying to open up trading on a private debt deal supporting Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI Corp., according to people with knowledge of the matter.
content: Apollo Global Management Inc. is trying to open up trading on a private debt deal supporting Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI Corp., according to people with knowledge of the matter.
